mapper.select: SELECT S.id, S.type, S.ip, P.server_id as port_server_id, P.port as port_port, P.protocol as port_protocol FROM streamservers S LEFT OUTER JOIN serverports P on S.id = P.server_id WHERE S.id = #{id}
